FULL STACK DEVELOPER

I am a full stack developer with close to 1.5 years experience building web applications using modern technologies. I specialize in using ReactJS specifically NextJS. On the backend I am familiar with NodeJS. I use Digital Ocean to deploy most of my web apps.

Shoe Cadet

NEXTJS, NODE/EXPRESS, MONGODB, STRIPE

Where you can purchase a slot to possibly get the latest sneaker from Nike. All the data is fetched from our backend. Stripe handles the payment processing. The owner has access to an admin section which requires a username/password. It allows the owner to add or delete upcoming shoes.

Live Site
Source Code

World Facts

REACT, REDUX, REST COUNTRY API

Search the details of every country in the world instantly. Filter by continent. Toggle between Light and dark mode

Live Site

Insta-Flame

REACT, REDUX, MONGODB, NODE

Instaflame is written using the MERN stack (Mongo Express React Node). It handles authentication with JWT's. I tried copying Instagrams layout/design and rewriting it on my own.
